description: Sum of even numbers between consecutive primes.
comments: First differences of A024701. - _Gionata Neri_, May 25 2015
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
example: a(4) = 18 = 8+10 as the even numbers between 7 and 11 are 8 and 10. a(4) = (11+7)(11-7)/4 = 18.
mathematica: Total[Select[Range[#[[1]]+1,#[[2]]-1],EvenQ]]&/@ Partition[ Prime[ Range[ 60]],2,1] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, May 28 2013 *)
prog: (PARI) { for (n=1, 1000, a=(prime(n + 1)^2 - prime(n)^2)/4; if (n==1, a=0); write("b062046.txt", n, " ", a) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 30 2009
